LanguageData.Mousekin_Plant_NutChonko.label: chonko nut bush
LanguageData.Mousekin_Plant_NutChonko.description: A bushy plant which grows slowly but yields delicious and nutritious chonko nuts, which resemble oversized almonds. Chonko nuts are usually roasted, but they're also good to eat even when raw.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Plant_NutNyam.label: nyam nut bush
LanguageData.Mousekin_Plant_NutNyam.description: A bushy plant which grows relatively quickly and yields lots of delicious nyam nuts, which resemble macadamias with faint stripes once they are removed from their pomengranate-like husks. Nyam nuts are usually roasted or ground into spreadable pastes, but they're also good to eat even when raw.
